title: J&J Injury Claimants Open New Front Against Possible Talc Bankruptcy
sub_head: More talc-injury claimants try to prohibit J&J from possibly sweeping personal-injury liabilities into chapter 11
body:
A group of cancer victims blaming Johnson & Johnsonâ€™s talc-based baby powder for their ailments asked a Missouri court to block the company from taking steps to place its talc liabilities into bankruptcy as it faces scrutiny on several fronts of how it could address thousands of tort claims.
